channel.name: Import Database Schema
channel.description:
This channel provides a utility to create a database schema based off a database that you point it at with the right credentials.
See http://help.interfaceware.com/v6/import-database-schema â€Ž
This schema makes it easy to map data into a database using the db:merge{} function and enables these schema to be created with just Iguana without using Chameleon.
It uses the human readable "DBS" format.
You will need to edit the channel to point at the credentials of a real database that you have.
